title: Harlow
description: Ideal for lazy days, Harlow's large proportions and plump cushions make relaxing easy. This sofa's metal legs contrast the soft upholstery perfectly. Notice the pulled detail, adding interest to the pared-back style. This is a seriously comfortable living room addition.

title: Marcell
description: Marcell's the on-trend organiser's dream. The plinth base and metal handles are distinctly minimal, plus the mix of drawer sizes and central cupboard keeps everything in order. Messy cables? We'll take care of those.

title: Kolton
description: The laid-back shape of Kolton is a contemporary look full of charmâ€“ it's the perfect effortless statement. This playful rocking chair is wide, welcoming, and comfortably chic, with quilted upholstery details that feel wooly and warm. A new favourite spot to curl up, rock back and relax.
